mapper.select: select distinct sido_cd sidoCd ,sido_nm sidoNm from admdong order by sido_cd
select distinct sgg_cd sggCd ,sgg_nm sggNm from admdong where sido_cd = #{sidoCd} order by sgg_nm
select distinct admdong_cd admdongCd ,admdong_nm admdongNm from admdong where sgg_cd = #{sggCd} order by admdong_nm
